janadhipathiwaraya wetha piliganwima da suwisheshi siddhiyak wiyaga ehidi wadiduratath adahas dakwu janadhipathiwaraya mese da kiyaga loka janawasa dinaya aarambha karala adata awurudu 28 k wenawaga 1985 di eksath jathinge manawa janawasa komisama aarambha karana kota loka janawasa dinayak yojana wunath eeka kriyathmaka wune 1986 diga ee wagema ada dinaya ape ratata thawath suwisheshayiga nidahasin passe me rata bharagath siyaluma rajayan wiwidha prathipaththila kramawedala niwasa gataluwa wisandanna idiripath kalaga namuth samata sadharana idiri dakmak sahitha jathika niwasa prathipaththiyak sakas wune nahaga mudal wiyadam karala sidukarapu wadapiliwelawal walin ewani prathipaththiyak elidakwune nahaga ada jathika niwasa prathipaththiya elidakwanna apa rajayata puluwankama labuna kiyala me awasthawedi api aadambarayen mathak karanawaga nidahasin passe awurudu hatapahak gewila giya mohothakayi me aithihasika awasthawa elambaunega eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye yojana kriyathmaka kirima gana kiwwahama obata mathak kala yuthu deyak thiyenawaga eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye kamitu rashiyak thiyenawaga kamkarula aaharala lama aadi washayenla me sama kamituwakma me rate wada gana ithama ihalin pahadimen katha karannega namuth thrasthawadi samaye me rate aarakshawa honda naha kiyala ratin pana giya kandayam ekathuwela hadagath dayasporawathla atham balawath ratawaluth ekathuwela balapam karawana nisa jiniwawala thibena jagath manawa himikam kamituwen witharayi apita chodana ella karannega eyath me awasthawe api mathak karanna oonaga thrasthawadaya awasan karala ada oba bhukthi windina nidahasa gana ee aya katha karanne nahaga kese wethath me janawasa komisameth ilakkaya api sampurna karagena yanawaga me janawasa komisame aramunu aasiyawe ithama hondin sapurapu rata lankawayiga ee nisa 2014 loka janawasa dinaya api samaranne wishala abhimanayakinga apata ee sandaha shakthiya thibenawaga ape rate niwasakaranayata palamu rajya madihathwima labenne 1915 diga ee yatath wijitha palakayo handunwa dunna niwasa ha nagarika sanwardhana aagnya panatha nisayiga nidahasin passe mul yugaye ape awadhanaya krushikarmanthayata yomu wuna nisa nagarika niwasa prashnaya wishala deyak hatiyata salakuwe naga wisheshayenma krushikarmanthaya nisa gowi janapada bihiwunaga ee nisa niwasa gataluwa diha baluwe wenas widiyakinga niwasa pilibanda gataluwa hondatama balapawe nagarayataga kolambaata simawela thibuna janawasa prashnayaga maha parisara prashnath ekka eeka gatagahila thibunega 1970 mama parlimenthu manthriwarayek washayen siti kalaye pitar kenaman amathithuma duppath janathawage niwasa ayithiya wenuwen rata gana hithala honda wadapiliwelak dammaga eewa idiripath kalaga eya sudussanta labunaga ee ithihasaya ada obata mathaka nahaga namuth 77 n passe eeka athaharala thanikara deshapalana niwasa wadapiliwelak aarambha kalaga janathawage me ithama sanwedi dewal deshapalanikaranaya karana eka honda thaththwayak neweyiga noyek honda wadasatahan thibunaga namuth eewa deshapalanikaranaya wela thibunaga hithawathkamwalata eewa labunega ulu katayakla takaramak beduwath eewata noyek balapam athiwela thibunaga api dannawa eda samahara welawata parata penena tika witharak haduwaga pitipassa ehemama thibunaga ee witharak noweyi elga tiga tiga eega sanwidhanaya ekthara kalayaka upakramashili widihata kolambaa ha thadasanna pradesha awata janathawa genath padinchi kalaga eya sanwidhanathmakawa sidukalaga mewa janathawata kiyanna oonaga bedumwadin eeka kale awasthawadiwa prayojana gannaga api ehema nahaga namuth api kisima jathila aagamla paksha bhedawalin thorawayi api niwasa wadapiliwelawal aarambha karala kriyathmaka karannega apata owunge deshapalanaya wadagath nahaga manushyathwayayi wadagathga owunge patala aagamla jathila kathakarana bhashawa apata awashya nahaga apita oona me rate janathawa lassana niwasayakala honda parisarayaka jiwath wenawa dakinnaga ee witharak noweyi eda wenath ratawala rajya nayakayo lankawata enakota samaharunta me nagarawalin eliyata enna bariwunaga ehema yugayak apata awashya nahaga ada hama wasarakama loke piligath samulu lankawe pawathwanawaga loka nayakayan lankawata enawaga ee aya dan lankawata aawama wenath ratak dakinawaga api santhosha wenawaga ada obe daruwa methana idiripath kala ranganaya pilibandawaga eelanga rajya nayakaya lankawata paminena awasthawe araliyagaha mandirayedi api ohu wenuwen idiripath karana sanskruthika anga idiripath kirima sandaha me lassana daru patawuntath awasthawa labadenna api katayuthu karanawaga ee sanskruthika wenasa api athikaranna oonaga janathawage jiwana kramaya wenas kala yuthuwa thibenawaga apita hanganna wahanna deyak naga ape hati dan lokayama dannawaga api karagena yana wadapiliwela idiriyata karagena yanna api hamoma ekathu wenna oonaga mahinda chinthanaye sandahan aakarayata shri lankawe sama purawasiyekma niwasak himi ayek wenna oona kiyana prathipaththiya apata thibenawaga eeka thamayi ape darshanayaga eya labadimayi ape aramunaga ee nisayi me wadapiliwela api diyath karannega 2016 wana wita ape aramuna thibena siyaluma palpath niwasa iwath kota oba honda niwasawala padinchi karawimala pasugiya kalaye hadapu niwasawala pramanaya warga adi 450 yiga eya warga adi 500 dakwa wadi karala hadanna kiyala api niyama karala thibenawaga ee anuwa aluthen hadana niwasa hadenne ee pramanayataga ee aakarayatayi api me wadapiliwela hadala thibennega ee sandaha apata me rate hamogema sahayogaya awashyayiga samahara pradeshawala daruwanta jiwathwenna thibenne nusudusu parisarayakga me parisaraya api wenas kala yuthuwa thibenawaga mathdrawya walin me daruwa nidahas kara ganime wagakima apata thibenawaga ee sandaha api kapawenawaga me aya me niwasawala padinchi karawima ee daruwan ee thaththwayangen mudawa ganime ek angayakga mewa karanakota noyek boru prachara genayawiga eewata rawatenna epaga daruwage yahapatha wenuwen sathbhawayen sidukarana hama karyakma api nirbhayawa itu karanna sudanamga obe sahayogaya me niwasa sanwardhana wadapiliwelatala wyapruthiwalatala amathyathumata ha niladharinta labadila eewa kriyathmaka karawanna me loka janawasa dinayedi api katayuthu karamu kiya illanawaga ape rata me palpath manasikathwayen mudawa gannata oba apa ha katayuthu karannaga idikirimla injineru sewala niwasa ha podu pahasukam amathi wimal wirawansha mahatha - janawasakaranaya athin api inne durwala thanaka noweyiga samaharu anduru pathi witharak gana katha kara kara innawaga dakunu aasiyawe balawath niwasakaranaya aththe lankaweyiga wadima sthira niwasa aththeth lankaweyiga eya wenath ratawalata sapekshawa itha ihala agayakga dakunu aasiyawe palpath aduma ratath lankawayiga janagahana anupathaya desa baluwath lankawa pragathiyak laba thibenawaga palpath pawul hatadahasakata pahasukam sahitha mahal niwasa laba dime wadasatahanak aanduwa kriyathmaka kara thiyenawaga 2015 wasaredi mahal niwasa 30la000 k ema janathawata laba dimata awashya katayuthu karanawaga ithiri siyalu
